svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/28.0.6 Chrome/138.0.7204.100 Electron/37.2.3 Safari/537.36" version="28.0.6"> <diagram id="prtHgNgQTEPvFCAcTncT" name="Page-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="1479" dy="1121" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-1" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="150" width="340" height="260" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-3" value="FAST API" style="shape=ext;double=1;rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="510" y="150" width="340" height="260" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-4" value="PostgreSQL" style="strokeWidth=2;html=1;shape=mxgraph.flowchart.database;whiteSpace=wrap;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="970" y="150" width="180" height="260" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-5" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.542;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="389" y="279.5" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="510" y="280.4200000000001" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-6" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.542;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="850" y="279.5" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="971" y="280.4200000000001" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-7" value="" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="200" width="190" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-10" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="230" width="50" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-11" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;">Front</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="100" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-13" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;">Back</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="610" y="100" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-14" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;">DB</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="990" y="100" width="140" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-15" value="HTTP" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="425" y="240" width="50" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-16" value="POST&nbsp; /validate - проверка INVEST<div>GET /history - получение истории&nbsp; &nbsp;</div><div>POST /fix - автоисправление стори</div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="555" y="550" width="250" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-18" value="LLM" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="620" y="500" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-29" value="<div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">JSON</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><br></span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">Коды статусов:</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><br></span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">200 - ОК (успешная проверка)</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">400 - Bad Request (некорректный ввод)</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">422 - Unprocessable Entity (ошибка валидации INVEST)</span></div><div style="text-align: justify;"><span style="background-color: transparent; color: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));">500 - Internal Server Error (сбой LLM или БД)</span></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="470" width="350" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-30" value="" style="endArrow=classic;startArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-18" target="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-3"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="625" y="460" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="675" y="410" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-31" value="HTTP/HTTPS" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="685" y="440" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mx6wjBY3nqEC1_GzwgyL-32" value="TCP/IP" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="880" y="248" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 334px; height: 1px; padding-top: 180px; margin-left: 463px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

div.div:
POST /validate - проверка INVEST
GET /history - получение истории
POST /fix - автоисправление стори
